org.gearvrf.animation

Class GVRAnimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRComponent
        • org.gearvrf.GVRBehavior
          • org.gearvrf.animation.GVRAnimator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GVRDrawFrameListener

    public class GVRAnimator
extends GVRBehavior
    Group of animations that can be collectively manipulated. Typically the animations belong to a particular model and represent a sequence of poses for the model over time. This class allows you to start, stop and set animation modes for all the animations in the group at once. An asset which has animations will have this component attached to collect the animations for the asset.
    See Also:
    GVRAssetLoader, GVRExternalScene, GVRAnimator, GVRAnimationEngine

    • Field Detail

      • mAnimations

        protected java.util.List<GVRAnimation> mAnimations

    • Constructor Detail

      • GVRAnimator

        public GVRAnimator(GVRContext ctx)
        Make an instance of the GVRAnimator component. Auto-start is not enabled - a call to start() is required to run the animations.
        Parameters:
        ctx - GVRContext for this animator

      • GVRAnimator

        public GVRAnimator(GVRContext ctx,
                   boolean autoStart)
        Make an instance of the GVRAnimator component. If auto start is enabled the animations should automatically be started. Otherwise an explicit call to start() is required to start them.
        Parameters:
        ctx - GVRContext for this animator
        autoStart - true to automatically start animations.

    • Method Detail

      • getComponentType

        public static long getComponentType()

      • autoStart

        public boolean autoStart()
        Determine if this animator should start all the animations automatically or require an explicit call to start().
        Returns:
        true if auto start is enabled, false if not

      • addAnimation

        public void addAnimation(GVRAnimation anim)
        Adds an animation to this animator. This animation will participate in any subsequent operations but it's state will not be changed when added. For example, if the existing animations in this animator are already running the new one will not be started.
        Parameters:
        anim - animation to add
        See Also:
        removeAnimation(GVRAnimation), clear()

      • removeAnimation

        public void removeAnimation(GVRAnimation anim)
        Removes an animation from this animator. This animation will not participate in any subsequent operations but it's state will not be changed when removed. For example, if the animation is already running it will not be stopped.
        Parameters:
        anim - animation to add
        See Also:
        addAnimation(GVRAnimation), clear()

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all the animations from this animator. The state of the animations are not changed when removed. For example, if the animations are already running they are not be stopped.
        See Also:
        removeAnimation(GVRAnimation), addAnimation(GVRAnimation)

      • setRepeatMode

        public void setRepeatMode(int repeatMode)
        Sets the repeat mode for all the animations in this animator. The number of times an animation is repeated is controlled by the repeat count.
        Parameters:
        repeatMode - Value from GVRRepeatMode ONCE - run the animations once REPEATED - repeat the animation PINGPONG - run forward, run reverse, repeat
        See Also:
        setRepeatCount(int)

      • setRepeatCount

        public void setRepeatCount(int repeatCount)
        Sets the repeat count for all the animations in this animator. This establishes the number of times the animations are repeated if the repeat mode is not set to ONCE.
        Parameters:
        repeatCount - number of times to repeat the animation -1 indicates repeat endlessly 0 indicates animation will stop after current cycle
        See Also:
        setRepeatMode(int)

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts all of the animations.
        See Also:
        reset(), GVRAnimationEngine.start(GVRAnimation)

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops all of the animations associated with this animator.
        See Also:
        start(), GVRAnimationEngine.stop(GVRAnimation)

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets all animations to their initial state. If the animations are running, they will start again at the beginning.
        See Also:
        GVRAnimation.reset(), start()
